track.name: Babel
comments: love that little whoop! His voice is amazing, the playing is tight and grand.  Amazing!
if you like this song, the I strongly recommend you to check iranian traditional music out!
which is the one about Laura Marling?
#58 in the Triple J Hottest 100 - counting down the best songs of 2012!
this band deserves more recognition than it is getting

"One, For Words" is the debut album by Keston Cobblers' Club. You can listen to the whole album here http://kestoncobblersclub.bandcamp.com/album/one-for-words and here is their BBC Session for Steve Lamacq - http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p00zl8jn

the walls of this town come CRUMBLING DOOOOOWWWWNNNNNN!!!!!
lines like that make me want to go bungee jumping for some reason.
